custom:content.p: You can use our tracking system to report bugs or ask for new features. Please note that will have to create an account (spam protection). Account creation is fast and easy so don't hesitate.
For all remarks and questions, feel free to contact us: Omiscid-info@no@spam@lists.gforge.inria.fr
This page will contain the frequently asked questions about and the associated answers. Feel free to contact us if you are thinking of something that should be added here.
You can access to our forums in order to ask question about .
You can use to our Tracking system to report bugs for example.
You may want to register to our mailing-lists.
You can get information about the download section or directly access to the download area of the forge
